p: Lawrence [ 64, 65, 66] has published three reviews on P. nigrum. Table 10 summarizes his finding relative to the main compounds in black and white P. nigrum [ 64, 65], while Table 11 details the data from his latest review [ 66]. Table 12 summarizes the main data from papers published after Lawrenceâ€™s reviews or not taken into account by the author.
